actions.text: Amendment SA 4080 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 58 - 41. Record Vote Number: 263.

Amendment SA 4080 proposed by Senator Young. (consideration: CR S7488-7503; text: CR S7488) To clarify that this resolution prohibits United States Armed Forces from refueling non-United States aircraft conducting missions as part of the ongoing civil war in Yemen.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4080 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 58 - 41. Record Vote Number: 263.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 4080 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 58 - 41. Record Vote Number: 263.

purpose: To clarify that this resolution prohibits United States Armed Forces from refueling non-United States aircraft conducting missions as part of the ongoing civil war in Yemen.
